title: Timothy
lyrics:
Playing on your own in a dusty bar
Nobody could tell that you a star
Nobody could feel all the pain you express
Hey dusty diamond soon you'll outshine them
Timothy play your song ooh till the break of dawn

Play for the mornin' moon and let it sooth

Broken parts ooh every broken heart

Play for the lonely one and let it run



Little blue bird you will never fit in

That's the biggest gift you ever could get

Passion pulled you in, pull you in on the trip

Hey dusty diamond, soon you'll outshine them



Timothy play your song ooh till the break of dawn

Play for the morning moon and let it sooth

Broken parts ooh every broken heart

Play for the lonely one and let it run



Once on the cover of a magazine

Once everybody wanna be your friend

Everybody everybody everybody everybody

Everybody saying that they knew you back when

Young dusty diamond, soon you'll outshine them



Timothy

Timothy



Play your song ooh till the break of dawn

Timothy play your song ooh till the break of dawn



Sending out shivers

Now you're up on the big stage

Girls crying rivers

For the same lonely songs you sang

At the old black when everybody laughed and laughed

And laughed and laughed

Now you're up on the big stage Timothy

Ooh, Timothy



Everybody say

Ooh-ooh, wow

Ooh-ooh, wow

Timothy, yeah



Everybody said

Ooh-ooh, wow

Ooh-ooh, wow

Timothy, yeah



Everybody said

Ooh-ooh, wow

Ooh-ooh, wow

Timothy, yeah



Everybody said

Ooh-ooh, wow

Ooh-ooh, wow

Timothy, yeah
